result.eng: Jamie was four years old, no more, no less.
result.ga: Ceithre bliana gan lá chuige nó uaidh a bhí Séimí
result.orig: Ceithre bliana gan lá chuige nó uaidh a bhí Séimí
result.html: Ceithre bliana gan lá chuige nó uaidh a bhí SéimíJamie was four years old, no more, no less.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre bliana gan lá ċuige nó uaiḋ a ḃí SéimíJamie was four years old, no more, no less.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.html: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ Séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: Jamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.
result.ga: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí Séimí
result.orig: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí Séimí
result.html: I gceann a sheacht mblian a bhí SéimíJamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.
result.ponchtml: I gceann a ẛeaċt mblian a ḃí SéimíJamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar Ṡeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ga: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair
result.orig: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair
result.html: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ponchtml: Ní ligfeaḋ an eagla do Ṡéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.

result.eng: Jamie stood leaning against a corner.
result.ga: Sheasaigh Séimí agus a thaca le coirnéal
result.orig: Sheasaigh Séimí agus a thaca le coirnéal
result.html: Sheasaigh Séimí agus a thaca le coirnéalJamie stood leaning against a corner.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeasaiġ Séimí agus a ṫaca le coirnéalJamie stood leaning against a corner.

result.eng: The next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ga: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.orig: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.html: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ponchtml: Lá arna ṁáraċ ḃí Séimí arís ina ċruṫ féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
